verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon שׁוֹשַׁנִּ֬ים <WH7799> upon Shoshannim לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <WH3467> Save אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> me O God כִּ֤י <WH3588> for בָ֖אוּ <WH935> are come מַ֣יִם <WH4325> for the waters עַד־ <WH5704> against נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> in unto [my] soul

טָבַ֤עְתִּי ׀ <WH2883> I sink בִּיוֵ֣ן <WH3121> mire מְ֭צוּלָה <WH4688> in deep וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there מָעֳמָ֑ד <WH4613> where [there is] no standing בָּ֥אתִי <WH935> I am come בְמַעֲמַקֵּי־ <WH4615> into deep מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> waters וְשִׁבֹּ֥לֶת <WH7641> where the floods שְׁטָפָֽתְנִי׃ <WH7857> overflow

יָגַ֣עְתִּי <WH3021> I am weary בְקָרְאִי֮ <WH7121> of my crying נִחַ֪ר <WH2787> is dried גְּר֫וֹנִ֥י <WH1627> my throat כָּל֥וּ <WH3615> fail עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> mine eyes מְ֝יַחֵ֗ל <WH3176> while I wait לֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> for my God

רַבּ֤וּ ׀ <WH7231> are more מִשַּׂעֲר֣וֹת <WH8185> than the hairs רֹאשִׁי֮ <WH7218> of mine head שֹׂנְאַ֪י <WH8130> They that hate חִ֫נָּ֥ם <WH2600> me without a cause עָצְמ֣וּ <WH6105> are mighty מַ֭צְמִיתַי <WH6789> they that would destroy אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> me [being] mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> wrongfully אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> What לֹא־ <WH3808> did not גָ֝זַ֗לְתִּי <WH1497> [that] which I took not away אָ֣ז <WH227> then אָשִֽׁיב׃ <WH7725> then I restored

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> O God אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> who יָ֭דַעְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest לְאִוַּלְתִּ֑י <WH200> my foolishness וְ֝אַשְׁמוֹתַ֗י <WH819> and my sins מִמְּךָ֥ <WH4480> at לֹא־ <WH3808> are not נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <WH3582> are not hid

אַל־ <WH408> not יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> be ashamed בִ֨י ׀ קֹוֶיךָ֮ <WH6960> Let not them that wait אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> on thee O Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָ֫א֥וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אַל־ <WH408> nay יִכָּ֣לְמוּ <WH3637> thee be confounded בִ֣י מְבַקְשֶׁ֑יךָ <WH1245> for my sake let not those that seek אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗י <WH430> for my sake O God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because עָ֭לֶיךָ <WH5921> your sake נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> Because for thy sake I have borne חֶרְפָּ֑ה <WH2781> reproach כִּסְּתָ֖ה <WH3680> hath covered כְלִמָּ֣ה <WH3639> shame פָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> my face
מ֭וּזָר <WH2114> I am become a stranger הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> have לְאֶחָ֑י <WH251> unto my brethren וְ֝נָכְרִ֗י <WH5237> and an alien לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> children אִמִּֽי׃ <WH517> unto my mother's

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For קִנְאַ֣ת <WH7068> For the zeal בֵּיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> of thine house אֲכָלָ֑תְנִי <WH398> hath eaten me up וְחֶרְפּ֥וֹת <WH2781> and the reproaches ח֝וֹרְפֶ֗יךָ <WH2778> of them that reproached נָפְל֥וּ <WH5307> thee are fallen עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and
וָאֶבְכֶּ֣ה <WH1058> When I wept בַצּ֣וֹם <WH6685> with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> [and chastened] my soul וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> became לַחֲרָפ֣וֹת <WH2781> that was to my reproach לִֽי׃
וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> I made לְבוּשִׁ֣י <WH3830> also my garment שָׂ֑ק <WH8242> sackcloth וָאֱהִ֖י <WH1961> became לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like לְמָשָֽׁל׃ <WH4912> and I became a proverb

יָשִׂ֣יחוּ <WH7878> speak בִ֭י יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> They that sit in שָׁ֑עַר <WH8179> the gate וּ֝נְגִינ֗וֹת <WH5058> against me and I [was] the song שׁוֹתֵ֥י <WH8354> assuredly שֵׁכָֽר׃ <WH7941> strong drink

וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> Me תְפִלָּתִֽי־ <WH8605> But as for me my prayer לְךָ֨ ׀ יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> [is] unto thee O LORD עֵ֤ת <WH6256> time רָצ֗וֹן <WH7522> [in] an acceptable אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> O God בְּרָב־ <WH7230> in the multitude חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> of thy mercy עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <WH6030> hear בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> me in the truth יִשְׁעֶֽךָ׃ <WH3468> of thy salvation

הַצִּילֵ֣נִי <WH5337> Deliver מִ֭טִּיט <WH2916> me out of the mire וְאַל־ <WH408> not אֶטְבָּ֑עָה <WH2883> and let me not sink אִנָּצְלָ֥ה <WH5337> let me be delivered מִ֝שֹּֽׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> from them that hate וּמִמַּֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <WH4615> me and out of the deep מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> waters

אַל־ <WH408> Nor תִּשְׁטְפֵ֤נִי ׀ <WH7857> overflow שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת <WH7641> branch מַ֭יִם <WH4325> of water וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor תִּבְלָעֵ֣נִי <WH1104> swallow me up מְצוּלָ֑ה <WH4688> me neither let the deep וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor תֶּאְטַר־ <WH332> shut עָלַ֖י <WH5921> and בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> and let not the pit פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> her mouth

עֲנֵ֣נִי <WH6030> Hear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> me O LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH2617> for thy lovingkindness כְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> unto me according to the multitude רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ <WH7356> of thy tender mercies פְּנֵ֣ה <WH6437> turn אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> and do

וְאַל־ <WH408> not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> And hide פָּ֭נֶיךָ <WH6440> not thy face מֵֽעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> from thy servant כִּֽי־ <WH3588> I am in צַר־ <WH6887> for I am in trouble לִ֝֗י מַהֵ֥ר <WH4118> me speedily עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> hear

קָרְבָ֣ה <WH7126> Draw nigh אֶל־ <WH413> to נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> unto my soul גְאָלָ֑הּ <WH1350> [and] redeem לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> because אֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> me because of mine enemies פְּדֵֽנִי׃ <WH6299> it deliver

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> You יָדַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> Thou hast known חֶרְפָּתִ֣י <WH2781> my reproach וּ֭בָשְׁתִּי <WH1322> and my shame וּכְלִמָּתִ֑י <WH3639> and my dishonour נֶ֝גְדְּךָ֗ <WH5048> are before כָּל־ <WH3605> All צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <WH6887> mine adversaries

חֶרְפָּ֤ה ׀ <WH2781> Reproach שָֽׁבְרָ֥ה <WH7665> hath broken לִבִּ֗י <WH3820> my heart וָֽאָ֫נ֥וּשָׁה <WH5136> and I am full of heaviness וָאֲקַוֶּ֣ה <WH6960> and I looked לָנ֣וּד <WH5110> [for some] to take pity וָאַ֑יִן <WH369> there וְ֝לַמְנַחֲמִ֗ים <WH5162> but [there was] none and for comforters וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> none מָצָֽאתִי׃ <WH4672> but I found

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> They gave בְּבָרוּתִ֣י <WH1267> for my meat רֹ֑אשׁ <WH7219> me also gall וְ֝לִצְמָאִ֗י <WH6772> and in my thirst יַשְׁק֥וּנִי <WH8248> to drink חֹֽמֶץ׃ <WH2558> they gave me vinegar

יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> become שֻׁלְחָנָ֣ם <WH7979> Let their table לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> before לְפָ֑ח <WH6341> become a snare וְלִשְׁלוֹמִ֥ים <WH7965> them and [that which should have been] for [their] welfare לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> [let it become] a trap

תֶּחְשַׁ֣כְנָה <WH2821> be darkened עֵ֭ינֵיהֶם <WH5869> Let their eyes מֵרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> that they see וּ֝מָתְנֵ֗יהֶם <WH4975> not and make their loins תָּמִ֥יד <WH8548> continually הַמְעַֽד׃ <WH4571> to shake
שְׁפָךְ־ <WH8210> Pour out עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5921> out זַעְמֶ֑ךָ <WH2195> thine indignation וַחֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> upon them and let thy wrathful אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <WH639> anger יַשִּׂיגֵֽם׃ <WH5381> take hold

תְּהִי־ <WH1961> become טִֽירָתָ֥ם <WH2918> Let their habitation נְשַׁמָּ֑ה <WH8074> be desolate בְּ֝אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH168> in their tents אַל־ <WH408> may none יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> [and] let none dwell

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> Yourself אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> [him] whom thou hast smitten רָדָ֑פוּ <WH7291> For they persecute וְאֶל־ <WH413> of מַכְא֖וֹב <WH4341> to the grief חֲלָלֶ֣יךָ <WH2491> of those whom thou hast wounded יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH5608> and they talk

תְּֽנָה־ <WH5414> Add עָ֭וֹן <WH5771> iniquity עַל־ <WH5921> unto עֲוֹנָ֑ם <WH5771> unto their iniquity וְאַל־ <WH408> not יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <WH935> and let them not come בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6666> into thy righteousness

יִ֭מָּחֽוּ <WH4229> Let them be blotted מִסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> out of the book חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of the living וְעִ֥ם <WH5973> with צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> with the righteous אַל־ <WH408> not יִכָּתֵֽבוּ׃ <WH3789> and not be written
וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> I עָנִ֣י <WH6041> But I [am] poor וְכוֹאֵ֑ב <WH3510> and sorrowful יְשׁוּעָתְךָ֖ <WH3444> let thy salvation אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> O God תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <WH7682> set me up on high
אֲהַֽלְלָ֣ה <WH1984> I will praise שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> of God בְּשִׁ֑יר <WH7892> with a song וַאֲגַדְּלֶ֥נּוּ <WH1431> and will magnify בְתוֹדָֽה׃ <WH8426> him with thanksgiving
וְתִיטַ֣ב <WH3190> better לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> the LORD מִשּׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> than an ox פָּ֗ר <WH6499> [or] bullock מַקְרִ֥ן <WH7160> that hath horns מַפְרִֽיס׃ <WH6536> and hoofs

רָא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see עֲנָוִ֣ים <WH6035> The humble יִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <WH8055> [this and] be glad דֹּרְשֵׁ֥י <WH1875> that seek אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God וִיחִ֥י <WH2421> shall live לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <WH3824> and your heart

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שֹׁמֵ֣עַ <WH8085> heareth אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <WH34> the poor יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> For the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲ֝סִירָ֗יו <WH615> not his prisoners לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not בָזָֽה׃ <WH959> and despiseth

יְֽ֭הַלְלוּהוּ <WH1984> praise שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> Let the heaven וָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> and earth יַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH3220> him the seas וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> and everything רֹמֵ֥שׂ <WH7430> and every thing that moveth בָּֽם׃

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> For God י֘וֹשִׁ֤יעַ <WH3467> will save צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> Zion וְ֭יִבְנֶה <WH1129> and will build עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> that they may dwell שָׁ֝֗ם <WH8033> there וִירֵשֽׁוּהָ׃ <WH3423> there and have it in possession

וְזֶ֣רַע <WH2233> The seed עֲ֭בָדָיו <WH5650> also of his servants יִנְחָל֑וּהָ <WH5157> shall inherit וְאֹהֲבֵ֥י <WH157> it and they that love שְׁ֝מ֗וֹ <WH8034> his name יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> shall dwell בָֽהּ׃
